content:
I added new functionality to grab and pre-process the solar irradiance data from LASP - if you are interested in checking out, I updated the documentation in this notebook

https://github.com/NCAR/solar-forcing/blob/main/notebooks/simplified_api_example.ipynb

It is split in two - the flux calculation (ipr/iprm) and solar irradiance (ssi).

Let me know if you have any questions!
